synopsis.text: Grecian siblings, Porphyras and Mina, find their world turned upside down when a catastrophic earthquake claims the lives of their parents and leaves them orphaned. Just as they were starting to reap the benefits of their family's newly-opened petrol station, fate had other plans. Initially separated amidst the chaos, Porphyras manages to locate Mina, but instead of settling into a foster home, the duo embarks on a daring journey across Europe, seeking solace and a new beginning in the unknown.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
